text.verse: In primo Chirona petit Thetis ante precata
At thetis Aemonio Licomedi tradit Achillem
Tertius eacidem quaerit generat quoque Pirrhum,
Quartus at occultum Pelidem prodit Ulixi
Navigat eacides ad debita pergama quinto.
Themate proposito narrat Thetis alma rapinam
Tyndaridis conquesta, rates sed vana precatur
Tendit in aemoniam carum ablatura magistro
Acecidem tunc forte feras lethale fugantem
Ille redit laetusque dapum post munera matri
Fila movens canit heroas, nox occupat artus.
